Name: Mundo Lingo - Wednesday Language Exchange
Description: 9PM - 3AM (every Wednesday) - Easily mingle to meet nomads and locals. Flag stickers handed out of the languages you speak to encourage socializing.

Name: Mundo Lingo – Thursday Language Exchange
Description: 9PM - 3AM (every Thursday) - Easily mingle to meet nomads and locals. Flag stickers handed out of the languages you speak to encourage socializing.
